_xResult.title: 'Alessia' Trench Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Trench coat in 100% Venetian wool, silk & 100% organic sustainable cotton
_xResult.longdesc:
Working with top London tailor & couturier Lino Piani is not like any experience you've had before. For one thing, he's an expert in dressing the female body with creations that flatter and fit. Second, he approaches every commission with creative consultation to help you get precisely the outcome you want. If you have envied the highly personalized experiences that men get when they buy a top quality custom suit, you'll be delighted to know you can have this same experience no matter where you live. Lastly, his attention to detail and the finest fabrics mean this is an investment you'll treasure for years to come.

 

Lino Piani's single breasted trench in Venetian wool is not your average trench coat. It is tailored in England by experienced Saville Row tailors for to give you a perfect slim fit, and chases the blues while it chases the chills away. Features include a light structure, front and shoulder yokes, crossed flap pockets, adjustable cuff widths, and flared back "redingote" style. The coat comes fully lined to match with your choice of contrast sleeve lining. 

 

  • Available in in over 20 colors - see color card, specify preference in checkout notes
  • Rain resistant, multi season
  • Horn buttons fastening at front
  • 100% wool, lining 60% acetate / 40% viscose satin
  • Dry clean only

 

New Customer Special! 15% off your Lino Piani order for all new customers!
